<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Deprecate SaaS Status field on Software Model</description>
        <name>SAM - Deprecate SaaS Status on Software </name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateStatusWhereSaasStatus(status, saasStatus) {
	var smGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_software_product_model');
	smGr.addQuery('product.subscription_software', true);
	smGr.addQuery('product.ignore_installs', true);
	smGr.addQuery('saas_status', saasStatus);
	smGr.setValue('status', status);
	smGr.setWorkflow(false);
	smGr.updateMultiple();
}

function setStatusFromSaasStatus() {
	updateStatusWhereSaasStatus('In Production', 'in_use');
	updateStatusWhereSaasStatus('Retired', 'retired');
	updateStatusWhereSaasStatus('Build', 'trial');
}

function renameSaasStatusColumnOnSoftwareModel() {
	var newLabel = 'Status (Deprecated)';
	var docGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
	docGr.addQuery('name', 'cmdb_software_product_model');
	docGr.addQuery('element', 'saas_status');
	docGr.addQuery('label', '!=', newLabel);
	docGr.addQuery('language', 'en');
	docGr.query();

	if (docGr.next()) {
		docGr.setValue('status', newLabel);
		docGr.update();
	}
	//  update dictionary entry for status field on license position report
	var dictGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	dictGr.addQuery('name', 'cmdb_software_product_model');
	dictGr.addQuery('element', 'saas_status');
	dictGr.addQuery('column_label', '!=', newLabel);
	dictGr.query();

	if (dictGr.next()) {
		dictGr.setValue('column_label', newLabel);
		dictGr.update();
	}
}

setStatusFromSaasStatus();
renameSaasStatusColumnOnSoftwareModel();]]></script>
